H0.text: Luke, who is your father. Obi-Wan Kenobi

H1.text: Luke, who is your father. Yoda

H2.text: Luke, who is your father. Han Solo

H3.text: Luke, who is your father. Aniken

A4.text: He was asked to read the line 'Obi-Wan killed your father' instead of 'No, I am your father.'

A5.text: Only the director, the producers, and Mark Hamill knew the actual line, which was dubbed in later by Jones.

A7.text: Obi-Wan says that Luke's father was murdered by a traitorous Jedi named Darth Vader.

A8.text: Luke's father was murdered by a traitorous Jedi named Darth Vader.
